DOC.brief_summary: The primary objective of this observational study was the assessment of prognosis factors for having recourse to prostatic surgery in patients with BPH who were administered class-1 alpha blockers. The secondary objectives were the assessment of the time from alpha-adrenergic blockade treatment initiation to surgery and the evolution of patients during the study.
DOC.brief_title: Observational Study in Patients Suffering From Benign Prostatic Hyperplasia Treated With Alpha-adrenergic Blockade
DOC.criteria: Any patient with BPH for whom alphablocker treatment is indicated Patients who are already on class1 alphablockers can only participate in the study if all information required is known and/or available Patient's followup not possible Patients participating in another study History of BPH surgery Prostate cancer
